title: Do 3v3 ranked get rewards?
body: Never played ranked before, so I gotta ask: Do 3v3 ranked get reawards as 5v5 ranked does? And yes, I know this is a stupid question to ask.

replies.body:
Hey Cookeyjar!

Assume things work the same as they did last year, you'll receive rewards just like 5v5 ranked!

Hi katey, i know it's not really your departement stuff but is there any chance that, next season, the ranked team point will be adjusted?

something like increase the point to have the ward skin to 35-75-125, but changing the point per win to 3 points in twisted treeline and 5 points in summoners rift.
It will change nothing for the 5v5 player (still 7-15-25 win to earn the stuff) but, at least, it will make the grinding a bit less painfull for 3v3 team (from 75 to 42 win)
